full_summary:
# National Enterprise Fax Solution (EFAX)

## Procurement Summary

The [Indigenous Services Canada](http://www.indigenous.ca/) (ISC) is currently seeking a contractor to provide an Enterprise Fax Solution (EFAX) that serves the needs of various government departments, including ISC, Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC), and the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency (CanNOR).

## Tender Requirements
The submitted proposal shall consist of a Request for Proposal (RFP) that addresses the requirements outlined in the statement of work (SOW) provided in the Tender Notice. The initial contract period will last two (2) years from the contract award date, with up to eight (8) additional one (1) year option periods, based on mutual agreement between the contractor and the tendering agency.

## Security Clearance
A security clearance of "Reliability" is required prior to the award of the Contract.

## Trade Agreements
Tenders are invited from contractors who can fulfill the requirements of the following Trade Agreements:

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Tendering Details
The following details are related to the tender:

*   **Publication Date:** February 8, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2024 (14:00:00)
*   **Amendment Date:** March 13, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Not Specified
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **UNSpsc:** 44101700 (Printer and photocopier and facsimile accessories)
